How to (instantly) get better answers with AI.

☑ Step 1. Don't use ChatGPT.

✦ Don't get me wrong. It is still a useful tool.
✦ But you don't know where it's coming from.
✦ I will teach how to replace it, for free.

Shortcut: read this → https://lnkd.in/dpAVAZSs.

☑ Step 2. Find your favorite trusted source.

✦ Health? Andrew Huberman.
✦ Finance? Warren Buffett. 
✦ Sales? Alex Hormozi.

Get their PDFs and YouTube video interview links.

☑ Step 3. Go to NotebookLM.

✦ Upload your sources (websites, PDF, YouTube).
✦ Chat with your new agent (in the middle chatbot).
✦ "Save to note" to keep it forever (on the right).
✦ Use "Audio overview" to create a podcast.
✦ Keep on building your agent with new sources.

After watching this entire video (down below), you probably want to have access to my NotebookLM.

Access it here: https://lnkd.in/dueZmiBZ.

If you want to stay ahead, and master AI before it masters you, stop reading all of my Linkedin posts.

Instead, subscribe to my newsletter how-to-ai.guide
